name: NASCAR SimRacing
description: Experience the authenticity of NASCAR with a game designed by veterans and tested by actual NASCAR drivers—EA Sports NASCAR 2005 SimRacing for PC. The game features the top 3 NASCAR Series: NASCAR Craftsman Truck Series, NASCAR Busch Series and the NASCAR NEXTEL Cup Series. Choose a series, work your way through the minor leagues then battle head-to-head against the NASCAR elite with the all-new Career Mode. Up to 43 online players can race live on the same track. Also features a ranking system, hot lap leagues, tournaments and voice-over IP. Made in USA.
